mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(A.CO_CD) FROM ( /* 발주 완료되지 않은 건 + 완료된건 */ SELECT E.CO_CD , NVL(D.PCHS_NO, 'PC'||TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY')||'0000') AS PCHS_NO /*매입확정번호 */ , E.ORDRG_NO , E.ORDRG_SEQ , E.SALES_CD , B.PCHS_CLNT_CD /* 구매처cd */ , ( SELECT D.CLNT_NM FROM TB_BM02M01 D WHERE B.PCHS_CLNT_CD=D.CLNT_CD ) AS PCHS_CLNT_NM /* 구매처명 */ , F.MATR_CD , F.MATR_NM /* 자재명 */ , E.ORDRG_AMT /*발주 금액 */ , 'TRGTDIV03' AS TRGT_DIV , B.ORDRG_DT /* 발주일자 */ , D.PCHS_DT , D.CMPLET_YN FROM TB_SM02D01 E /* 매입 DETAIL */ INNER JOIN TB_SM02M01 B ON(E.CO_CD=B.CO_CD AND E.ORDRG_NO=B.ORDRG_NO AND E.SALES_CD=B.SALES_CD) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SM12D01 D ON(D.ORDRG_NO=E.ORDRG_NO AND D.ORDRG_SEQ=E.ORDRG_SEQ) /* 발주 DETAIL */ LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SM01D01 F ON(E.CO_CD=F.CO_CD AND E.SALES_CD=F.SALES_CD AND E.UPPER_CD=F.UPPER_CD AND E.LOWER_CD=F.LOWER_CD AND E.MATR_SEQ=F.MATR_SEQ AND E.MATR_CD=F.MATR_CD) /* 구매BOM 자재 */ WHERE 1=1 ) A /* 발주+매입 내역 */ WHERE 1=1

/* No. 내림차순 */ SELECT * FROM ( SELECT X.* , ROWNUM AS RN FROM ( SELECT A.CO_CD , A.PCHS_NO /* 매입번호 */ , A.TRGT_DIV , FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(A.TRGT_DIV) AS TRGT_DIV_NM , A.ORDRG_NO , A.ORDRG_SEQ , A.SALES_CD , A.PCHS_CLNT_CD , A.PCHS_CLNT_NM /* 구매처명 */ , A.MATR_CD , A.MATR_NM , A.ORDRG_AMT , A.ORDRG_DT , A.PCHS_AMT , A.PCHS_DT , A.CMPLET_YN , A.USER_CHK_V FROM ( /* 발주 완료되지 않은 건 + 완료된건 */ SELECT E.CO_CD , NVL(D.PCHS_NO, 'PC'||TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY')||'0000') AS PCHS_NO /*매입확정번호 */ , E.ORDRG_NO , E.ORDRG_SEQ , E.SALES_CD , B.PCHS_CLNT_CD /* 구매처cd */ , ( SELECT D.CLNT_NM FROM TB_BM02M01 D WHERE B.PCHS_CLNT_CD=D.CLNT_CD ) AS PCHS_CLNT_NM /* 구매처명 */ , F.MATR_CD , F.MATR_NM /* 자재명 */ , E.ORDRG_AMT /*발주 금액 */ , 'TRGTDIV03' AS TRGT_DIV , B.ORDRG_DT /* 발주일자 */ , D.PCHS_AMT /* 매입금액 */ , D.PCHS_DT , D.CMPLET_YN , 'N' AS USER_CHK_V FROM TB_SM02D01 E /* 매입 DETAIL */ INNER JOIN TB_SM02M01 B ON(E.CO_CD=B.CO_CD AND E.ORDRG_NO=B.ORDRG_NO AND E.SALES_CD=B.SALES_CD) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SM12D01 D ON(D.ORDRG_NO=E.ORDRG_NO AND D.ORDRG_SEQ=E.ORDRG_SEQ) /* 발주 DETAIL */ LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SM01D01 F ON(E.CO_CD=F.CO_CD AND E.SALES_CD=F.SALES_CD AND E.UPPER_CD=F.UPPER_CD AND E.LOWER_CD=F.LOWER_CD AND E.MATR_SEQ=F.MATR_SEQ AND E.MATR_CD=F.MATR_CD) /* 구매BOM 자재 */ WHERE 1=1 ) A /* 발주+매입 내역 */ WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY A.CO_CD, A.ORDRG_NO DESC, A.ORDRG_SEQ DESC, A.SALES_CD DESC ) X ) WHERE 1=1 AND RN BETWEEN ${firstIndex} AND ${lastIndex}

/* No. 내림차순 */ SELECT * FROM ( SELECT X.* , ROWNUM AS RN FROM ( SELECT A.CO_CD , FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(A.CO_CD) AS CO_CD_NM /* 회사명 */ , B.ORDRG_NO /* 발주번호 */ , B.REQ_NO /* 요인별 요청번호 */ , A.SALES_CD , B.PCHS_CLNT_CD /* 구매처cd */ , ( SELECT D.CLNT_NM FROM TB_BM02M01 D WHERE B.PCHS_CLNT_CD=D.CLNT_CD ) AS PCHS_CLNT_NM /* 구매처명 */ , TO_CHAR(B.ORDRG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDRG_DT /* 발주일자 */ , B.ORDRG_DIV10 /* 발주구분 */ , FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(B.ORDRG_DIV10) AS ORDRG_DIV10_NM /* 발주구분명 */ , B.ORDRG_DIV20 /* 용도구분 */ , FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(B.ORDRG_DIV20) AS ORDRG_DIV20_NM /* 용도구분명 */ , B.ORDRG_DIV30 /* 특성구분 */ , FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(B.ORDRG_DIV30) AS ORDRG_DIV30_NM /* 특성구분명 */ , B.CURR_CD /* 통화단위 */ , B.EXRATE , SUM(A.ORDRG_QTY) OVER(PARTITION BY A.CO_CD, A.ORDRG_NO, A.ORDRG_SEQ) ORDRG_QTY /* 발주수량 */ , SUM(A.ORDRG_AMT) OVER(PARTITION BY A.CO_CD, A.ORDRG_NO, A.ORDRG_SEQ) ORDRG_AMT /* 발주금액 */ , TO_CHAR(B.DUDT_DEQ_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') DUDT_DEQ_DT , B.CREAT_ID , B.CREAT_PGM , B.CREAT_DTTM , A.ORDRG_SEQ , B.ORDRG_DT , NVL(SUM(IN_QTY) OVER(PARTITION BY A.CO_CD, A.ORDRG_NO, A.ORDRG_SEQ), 0) IN_QTY /* 입고수량 */ , SUM(A.ORDRG_QTY) OVER(PARTITION BY A.CO_CD, A.ORDRG_NO, A.ORDRG_SEQ) - NVL(SUM(IN_QTY) OVER(PARTITION BY A.CO_CD, A.ORDRG_NO, A.ORDRG_SEQ), 0) AS REAMIN_IN_QTY /* 잔여수량 */ /*, FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(C.IO_DIV) AS IO_DIV_NM */ /* 아이템 구분명 */ /*, C.IO_DIV AS IO_DIV_CD */ /* 수불구분 */ , NVL( ( SELECT DISTINCT MAX(D.FILE_TRGT_KEY) OVER() AS FILE_TRGT_KEY FROM TB_SM03M01 D INNER JOIN TB_SM03D01 CC ON(CC.IN_NO=D.IN_NO) WHERE A.ORDRG_NO=CC.ORDRG_NO ) , 0) AS FILE_TRGT_KEY , ( SELECT DISTINCT MAX(D.IN_NO) OVER() AS IN_NO FROM TB_SM03M01 D INNER JOIN TB_SM03D01 CC ON(CC.IN_NO=D.IN_NO) WHERE A.ORDRG_NO=CC.ORDRG_NO ) AS IN_NO FROM TB_SM02D01 A INNER JOIN TB_SM02M01 B ON(A.CO_CD=B.CO_CD AND A.ORDRG_NO=B.ORDRG_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT C.ORDRG_NO , C.ORDRG_SEQ , NVL(SUM(IN_QTY), 0) AS IN_QTY FROM TB_SM03D01 C INNER JOIN TB_SM03M01 D ON(D.IN_NO=C.IN_NO) GROUP BY C.ORDRG_NO, C.ORDRG_SEQ, C.IN_NO ) C ON( A.ORDRG_NO=C.ORDRG_NO AND A.ORDRG_SEQ=C.ORDRG_SEQ) WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY A.CO_CD DESC, A.IN_NO DESC, A.CREAT_DTTM DESC, A.UDT_DTTM DESC ) X ) WHERE 1=1 /* 엑셀은 전체 조회 */
